title: The following quiz will reveal your Ayurvedic body type. It’ll only take 2 minutes.
desc: When choosing your answers please think of your situation all round rather than what you currently feel.

title: When it comes to your stature, you are…

questions.label: A
questions.text: Very tall or very short, slight.

questions.label: C
questions.text: You can be short, or larger, broader

title: When it comes to your stature, you are…

questions.label: A
questions.title: You find your skin tends to be dry, rough, or dull, and thin.
questions.text: You can see your veins. If you have acne, it’s mostly dry and bumpy, with blackheads.

questions.label: B
questions.title: You find your skin to be rosy, radiant, flushed, and warm.
questions.text: You are prone to freckles.  Your veins are less prominent. If you have acne, it’s red, irritated and angry looking.

questions.label: C
questions.title: Your skin is smooth, moist, thick, and pale.
questions.text: Your veins are not prominent. You have few freckles or moles. If you have acne, they are few, but greasy, with deep pustules.

title: When it comes to your stature, you are…

questions.label: A
questions.text: Very tall or very short, slight.

questions.label: C
questions.text: You can be short, or larger, broader

title: Please hold while we calculate the results…
desc: You’ll soon receive a detailed report of your Ayurvedic body type with food recomendations, nutritional tips and personalized meal plans.
